channel.title: Next Generation ~ 317 ~ Customs ~ Summoning ~ Overloads ~ Curses [ Read]
channel.description:
Owner: 1 Co-Owner: 1 Developer(s): 2 Administrator(s):1 Moderator(s): 1 Support team: 0 GFX Artist: 1
-------------------------- Note: If your applying for general staff then you may only apply for Support team.
Application: [code] *Name: *Age: *Location(Timezone): *What role are you applying for: -Programming languages: -How long have you been codeing: -GFX Examples: *How much time can you invest? -[Support team] What else can you offer apart from 'support? - Additional information: [/code]
Forums/Site: www.NextGeneration-Site.com IRC where all staff are: SwiftIRC- #VeeB
Were currently looking mainly for 1 developer & 1 GFX artist, although other applications will be welcome. Our developers are in opposite time zones so its hard this way, GMT timeonze shall be considered more than others.
[b]Why us?[/b]
We are hosted off a 24/7 Virtual Private Server, 99% uptime. Next Generation has custom items along with a stable economy, all in all a well-maintained server. A growing community which thrives on a server dedicated to bringing you the pinnacle of pking to the [u]Next Generation![/u]
However as much as this server is combat oriented, theres something for everyone! Here at NextGen we have successfully incorparated skills & features, Barrows / bosses / unique slayer system / summoning & much more to explore within a diverse and forever-growing community, bonded strongly by a must play, 317 server like never before.
[b][color=#00FF40][u]Custom items:-[/u][/b]
Note: The [b]only[/b] donator item is Overload.
Torva / Pernix / Virtus Korasi's sword Dragon defender Fighter helm Ardy cloak Chaotic staff / Chaotic rapier / Chaotic Maul / Chaotic crossbow / Chaotic longsword Vesta Longsword Statius Warhammer Vesta / statius / morrigan's / Zuriel Armour Elite Void Berserker Ring (I) Archers Ring (I) Seers Ring (I) Overload Divine / Arcane / Elysian & Spectral spirit shields Staff of light Arcane stream necklace
[color=#00FF40][b][u]Minigames / Skills / Misc:[/u][/b]
Slayer Curse prayers (Turmoil/soulsplit/etc..) Barrows Godwars Agility Hunter Summoning Mining Crafting Thieving
For the rest you will have to check it out yourself :P
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/347h1kx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5doxtf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/99qkvc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/33lpa3o.jpg[/img]

What do you mean by moved around hybrid server?

-shops moved from edge , maybe rearranged a little
-bank never fixed
-pretty much same skills
-ettc

what have you actually done…? (besides tutorials)

item.dc:creator: @Eddie_Crosswall Eddie Crosswall
item.description:
@Eddie_Crosswall wrote:

-never mind-

I do apologize your pictures were somewhat misleading to me. After playing your server for a few minutes I have realized this is just a moved around Hybrid server. Good luck with your development

Read full topic

item.title: Next Generation ~ 317 ~ Customs ~ Summoning ~ Overloads ~ Curses [ Read]
item.dc:creator: @proxiiie proxiiie
item.description:
@proxiiie wrote:

Thanks for applying I’ll consider your application. Allthough it seems like you want to work on items to much. There is other things that still need doing. Yes I’m putting 100% into this, no I don’t know Java myself but mostly fixing stuff & editting is common scene. In the mean time you can register on the forums through there I can contact you

Read full topic
